UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Dissection of the antimicrobial and hemolytic activity of Cap18: Generation of Cap18 derivatives with enhanced specificity.
Literature.Author: Ebbensgaard A, Mordhorst H, Overgaard MT, Aarestrup FM, Hansen EB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis subsp. lactis IL1403(MIC=>=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=>=32µg/ml),Yersinia ruckeri 392/2003(MIC=>=32µg/ml),Aeromonas salmonicida ATCC 33658(MIC=>=32µg/ml)
